name: Lume and the Shifting Void
storyline:
Strange, other-worldly rifts have been spawning in remote areas around the world, but no one in the city seemed to know or care. A group of rogue hackers & scientists going by the name of Hexloop have discovered and captured "Void Essence" from the rifts in an effort to study it. They discover Void Essence is a limitless, powerful source of energy with yet unknown results and applications . . .

Enter Lume! Pizza Delivery Girl-turned-World Saving Hero, "recruited" by Hexloop to field test their highly experimental and perfectly safe (?) Holostrikers in rifts around Dolgrum City. Alongside her increasingly-frustrated robotic co-worker R16, Lume brawls, bounces, & battles other-dimensional threats in and out of The Shifting Void to save the day ... and a bigger tip!
summary: Join Lume in a fight against the other-dimensional hordes of The Shifting Void with her experimental Holostrikers in this platform-action adventure!
